title: 99th Hoboken Italian Festival: Feast of the Madonna dei Martiri
description: A festival celebrating Italian culture along Sinatra Drive between 1st and 3rd Streets.

title: Paul Reubens Selects
description: A film series at BAM Rose Cinemas featuring various films selected by Paul Reubens. Admission is $17 for general and $12 for seniors.

title: Metropolitan Postcard Club Show + Sale
description: A show and sale featuring various postcards at the Church of the Village in Greenwich Village. Admission is $3.
address: Church of the Village, Greenwich Village

title: Maum Market: Asian Makers Market
description: An Asian makers market at Pier 17 in the Seaport area.

title: 45th Annual Richmond County Fair
description: A fair featuring various activities at Historic Richmond Town, Staten Island. Admission is $15 for general, $12 for seniors, and $7 for youths.

title: Summer Send-Off Bazaar at Grand Bazaar NYC
description: An indoor and outdoor bazaar at 100 W 77th St at Columbus Ave (UWS).
address: 100 W 77th St at Columbus Ave, UWS

title: 58th Annual West Indian Day Parade
description: A parade along Eastern Parkway from Utica Avenue to Grand Army Plaza in Brooklyn.
address: Eastern Parkway from Utica Avenue to Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn

title: Animation Mixtape
description: A film series at IFC Center featuring various animated films. Admission is $18 for general and $15 for seniors.

title: First as Tragedy, Then as Farce: Anti-Fascist Comedies
description: A film series at BAM Rose Cinemas featuring various anti-fascist comedies. Admission is $17 for general and $12 for seniors.

title: Third Annual ‘Big + Loud’ Screening Series
description: A film series at The Paris Theater featuring various classic films. Admission is $17 for general and $15 for seniors.

title: Down to Earth Festival
description: An international performance and theater festival held in outdoor spaces across Manhattan, Brooklyn, and Queens. Free admission.

title: Bryant Park Picnic Performances
description: An annual summer performance series featuring free live music, theater, and dance in Bryant Park. Free admission.

title: Pericles: A Public Works Concert Experience
description: A retelling of Shakespeare’s epic at The Cathedral of St. John the Divine. Free admission.
address: The Cathedral of St. John the Divine, Morningside Heights

title: Flop House Comedy Club
description: An indie comedy club featuring various comedians. Admission varies, with a promo code available for discounts.
address: 362 Grand Street, Williamsburg / 83 1st Ave, East Village

title: Free Outdoor Movies
description: Various free outdoor movie screenings at different parks. Check the schedule for specific films and locations.

title: Forever Michael
description: A birthday tribute party for Michael Jackson at Signal in East Williamsburg. Free entry during happy hour.

title: Bitches Brew Comedy Show
description: A women-produced and hosted comedy show at Halyards in Gowanus. Free admission with a tip jar.

title: Niche Night: Come Out and Play 90s + 2000s Alt Night
description: A dance party featuring 90s and early 2000s music at Alphaville in Bushwick. Free admission.
